title: Beetroot chicory and feta salad
ingredients: ['4 bunches small beetroots, stems removed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon dried thyme, crushed', '125ml vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 medium heads chicory', '450g mixed lettuce leaves', '150g feta cheese, crumbled']
